SpatialExperiment 0.99.1

    • 10x-Visum Spatial Data Analysis
    • seqFISH Spatial Data Workflow

scaleFactors-setter

scaleFactors-set-VisiumExperiment-method.Rd

sets the scale factors in a VisiumExperiment class object.

# S4 method for VisiumExperiment
scaleFactors(x) <- value

Arguments

x

a VisiumExperiment class object.
value

a list of 10x Visium scale factors.

Value

a VisiumExperiment class object.

Examples


example(VisiumExperiment)
#> 
#> VsmExp> barcodesFile <- system.file(file.path("extdata", "10x_visium",
#> VsmExp+                         "barcodes.tsv"),
#> VsmExp+                         package="SpatialExperiment")
#> 
#> VsmExp> barcodesEx <- read.csv(barcodesFile, sep="\t",
#> VsmExp+                         header=FALSE, col.names=c("Barcodes"))
#> 
#> VsmExp> featuresFile <- system.file(file.path("extdata", "10x_visium",
#> VsmExp+                         "features.tsv"), package="SpatialExperiment")
#> 
#> VsmExp> featuresEx <- read.csv(featuresFile, sep="\t",
#> VsmExp+                         header=FALSE, col.names=c("Barcodes", "Feature_name",
#> VsmExp+                         "Feature_type"))
#> 
#> VsmExp> countsFile <- system.file(file.path("extdata", "10x_visium",
#> VsmExp+                         "matrix.mtx"), package="SpatialExperiment")
#> 
#> VsmExp> countsEx <- Matrix::readMM(file=countsFile)
#> 
#> VsmExp> posFile <- system.file(file.path("extdata", "10x_visium",
#> VsmExp+                         "tissue_positions_list.tsv"),
#> VsmExp+                         package="SpatialExperiment")
#> 
#> VsmExp> tissPosEx <- read.csv(posFile,
#> VsmExp+                         sep="\t", header=FALSE,
#> VsmExp+                         col.names=c("Barcodes", "in_tissue",
#> VsmExp+                          "array_row", "array_col",
#> VsmExp+                          "pxl_col_in_fullres", "pxl_row_in_fullres"))
#> 
#> VsmExp> scaleFile <- system.file(file.path("extdata", "10x_visium",
#> VsmExp+                                    "scalefactors_json.json"), 
#> VsmExp+                          package="SpatialExperiment")
#> 
#> VsmExp> scalefactors <- rjson::fromJSON(file=scaleFile)
#> 
#> VsmExp> ve <- VisiumExperiment(rowData=featuresEx, colData=barcodesEx,
#> VsmExp+                          assays=c(counts=countsEx),
#> VsmExp+                          spatialCoords=tissPosEx,
#> VsmExp+                          scaleFactors=scalefactors, cellColID="Barcodes")
#> 
#> VsmExp> ve
#> class: VisiumExperiment 
#> dim: 50 50 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(1): counts
#> rownames: NULL
#> rowData names(3): Barcodes Feature_name Feature_type
#> colnames: NULL
#> colData names(1): Barcodes
#> reducedDimNames(0):
#> altExpNames(0):
#> spatialCoordinates(6): Barcodes in_tissue ... pxl_col_in_fullres
#>   pxl_row_in_fullres
#> inTissue(1): 22
